name: TangoCMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: TangoCMS is an open source (GNU/GPL 2.1) PHP Content Management System (CMS).

matches.text: <input type="checkbox" id="sessionRemember" name="session[remember]" value="1" checked="checked"> <label class="horizontal" for="sessionRemember">Remember me?</label>
